titleStmt.title: Letters conteyning sundry deuises touching the state of Flaunders and Portingall: written by Card. Granuelle and others, and lately intercepted and published.
titleStmt.author: Granvelle, Antoine Perrenot de, 1517-1586.

publicationStmt.publisher: At the Three Cranes in the vinetree by Thomas Dawson for Thomas Charde,

notesStmt.note: "Texts of 19 letters (11 of which are from Granvelle) dated in April 1582, most of them written from Madrid".--NUC Pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Three Cranes in the vinetree
